title: Introducing: French Royalty
body: Damn, really falling for this LA duo, **French Royalty** (Paige Califano and Josh Story) and their self-titled debut EP. From the brilliantly bizarre and over the top (_Daggers_), to the straight up pop of EP closer _Palm Tree Sadness_, they instil the sensuality of a Lana Del Rey or Lykke Li, with the ability to write a killer electronic-pop song that we’ve seen recently from the likes of CHVRCHES and Broods. There’s a real memorable kick to French Royalty, and definitely enough to suggest that they’re well worth keeping an eye on. Check out the full EP below. French Royalty by French Royalty
